import { ArrowLeftOutlined, ArrowRightOutlined } from '@material-ui/icons' import { useRef } from 'react' import Listitem from '../listItem/Listitem' import './list.scss' export default function List() { const listRef = useRef() // react element const handleClick = (direction) => { let distance = listRef.current.getBoundingClientRect().x - 50 if(direction === "left") { listRef.current.style.transform = 'translateX(${305}px)' } console.log("XD") console.log(distance) } return (
Continue to Watch
handleClick("left")}/>
handleClick("right")}/>
) }
